summary: During the violent chaos of post-War Japanese black market, a young gangster called Shozo Hirono has to keep up with the rapid shifts of power between unscrupulous bosses.
cast: Bunta Sugawara|Hiroki Matsukata|Kunie Tanaka|Eiko Nakamura|Tsunehiko Watase|Gorô Ibuki|Nobuo Kaneko|Toshie Kimura|Tamio Kawaji|Mayumi Nagisa|Asao Uchida|Shin'ichirô Mikami|Hiroshi Nawa|Shinji Takano|Keiji Takamiya|Shôtarô Hayashi|Kinji Nakamura|Harumi Sone|Asao Koike|Takashi Ebata|Naotsugu Uzaki|Takashi Noguchi|Hitoshi Ômae|Kazutarô Kuni|Gorô Ôki|Keiko Kojima|Akira Hirasawa|Ryô Nishida|Kojiro Shirakawa|Masaru Shiga|Minken Karasawa|Hiroko Sakaki|Chie Kobayashi|Takiko Azumi|Takuzô Kawatani|Yukio Miyagi|Kenji Ikeda|Shunji Sasaki|Seizô Fukumoto|Yoshiki Yamada|Yasumori Hikita|Masataka Iwao|Shintarô Mibu|Kuniomi Kitani|Yûsuke Tsukasa|Tsuyoshi Arita|Tetsuo Fujisawa|Hideo Fujimoto|Yasuo Matsumoto|Kiyotaka Nishiyama|Satoru Nabe|Teruo Fujinaga|Toshio Tomogane|Tamaro Murata|Shinji Oda|Ryuji Komine|Yasushi Ôshiro|Toshio Matsuda|Hiroshi Hatano|Ryûji Katagiri|Aki Takagi|Toshio Kitagawa|Tatsuo Umemiya|Akira Kobayashi|Mikio Narita|Takeshi Katô|Reiko Ike|Tetsurô Tanba|Tatsuo Endô|Rin'ichi Yamamoto
keywords: post world war two|hiroshima japan|gang war|organized crime|crime epic
title: Jingi naki tatakai
